title: I get a black screen after hitting launch
body: I am getting a black login screen after hitting launch on my client. It is also happening to my pbe client. I have tried reinstalling and running the repair utility. This problem happened out of the blue, I literally restarted my laptop and it started doing this; no updates occurred. Any help would be much appreciated.

replies.body: After selecting Launch from the patcher, your network needs to connect to our servers to allow you to login.  If no connection can be made properly, you may end up with the black screen that you saw.  I agree with RIneyy's suggestion to check our[ connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide.  There will be steps provided there to get you back in the client.  Let me know if you have any questions!

Ty, is there any specific one I should try first or should I just go down the line
edit- none of these did the trick

This due to unstable connection with the LoL servers. [Troubleshoot your connectivity issues.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)
